LanguageData.XFMParmor_Black_Shield.label: shield barrier
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Black_Shield.description: A barrier that blocks hostile attacks yet allow friendly fire to pass undisrupted. Shatters after absorbing too much damage.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Bullet_BlackA.label: rocket artillery
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MechanicalArmorCore_Black.comp: >Attacks hostiles with ranged attack. >If avaliable, ssist with rocket barrage when firing. >When harmed by ranged attack, automatically deploys shield barrier towards the origin of damage. >When harmed by melee attack, automatically fires shock blast.
Fires a volley of rockets in rapid succession, saturating target with firepower.
Raise a shield wall at target location, blocking hostile projectiles and blastwaves, while allowing friendly projectiles to pass.
Unleashes a shock blast that slows down enemies within range, interrupts their attacks, and have a chance to disarm them.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Black.label: mechframe heavy machinegun
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Black.description: A charged heavy machinegun feared for its impressive sustained firepower.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Black.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Black_Bullet.label: charge shot
